text: Erika worked with my husband and I to purchase our first rural block and was absolutely fantastic! She patiently walked us through all of our finance options, gave knowledgable advice and always had excellent communication. Erika worked extremely hard to help us make our dream a reality, something we will be forever grateful for! We would recommend MAKE Finance Group (and particularly Erika!) to any of our friends and family looking to purchase a property. The quality of service is incredible!

Exceptional Financial Services – Highly Recommended!

Make Finance has completely transformed my financial experience! Their team is not only knowledgeable and professional but also incredibly supportive and responsive. A special shoutout to Erika Low, whose expertise and dedication made my experience truly outstanding. She went above and beyond to ensure I had the best financial solutions tailored to my needs.

What truly sets Make Finance apart is their commitment to transparency and customer satisfaction. Erika took the time to explain every detail, making sure I felt confident in my financial decisions. The entire process, from consultation to execution, was smooth and hassle-free.

If you're looking for a reliable financial partner who genuinely cares about your success, I wholeheartedly recommend Make Finance—and especially Erika Low. Their expertise and dedication make them a standout choice in the industry!

We just wanted to take a moment to express our heartfelt thanks to Erika for all her  help in guiding us through the process of buying our first home. Her expertise and support made a significant difference, and we truly appreciate the time and effort she dedicated to ensuring everything went smoothly.

From the very beginning, she was there to answer our questions and provide us with valuable insights, which made the experience much less daunting. We couldn’t have done it without her!

Thank you once again for everything. We’re excited to start this new chapter in our lives

We couldn't of done it without  her

We recently purchased a new property and Chris assisted us in finding the best financing package to suit us. Simply put, Chris was a pleasure to deal with at all times. She was efficient and dealt with all of our questions promptly. Extremely happy with both the end package and the service throughout.

Geoff and Christine made our experience with MAKE Finance very simple and positive, and were very responsive to any of our queries along the way.  Highly recommend their services to anyone needing financial assistance and services for their business.
